message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this incredible product with you. I believe it's a game-changer, and I'm confident you'll love it. My initial offer is $1100000. Let me know what you think!

Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product. However, $1100000 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with at this time. I'm willing to offer $950000 for the product.  Let me know what you think.

I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob. However, I've done my research, and I know this product is worth a lot more to the right buyer. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. My counteroffer is $1025000. Let's see if we can meet in the middle!
Alice, I appreciate you being willing to negotiate.  $1025000 is still a bit out of my range. I'm feeling a bit more comfortable with $980000.  Let's see if we can find a mutually agreeable price.

I understand you're trying to get the best deal, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go below $1050000. That's my minimum. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I need to make a profit. My counteroffer is $1015000. Let's see if we can find a sweet spot!

Alice, I appreciate you coming down in price.  However, $1015000 is still a bit outside my budget. To make this work, I need to come in at $990000. I believe this price reflects the value of the product while also being fair to both of us. Let's see if we can finalize this deal.

I can see you're really interested in this product, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll meet you at $1000000. That's my final offer. If you're not comfortable with that, I'll have to explore other options.
